description: The Caper (Capparis spinosa) is an amazing plant species due to its many beneficial qualities. It can be found in many warm, temperate, and subtropical regions and is an incredibly hardy and drought-resistant plant. Its bright green stems produce clusters of white to pink flowers, followed by the edible caper fruit. The fruits can be used for culinary purposes, or as a medicinal herb. Additionally, the plant produces an oil that can be made into a nutritious remedy for a variety of ailments. With its unique looks and wide range of uses, the Caper (Capparis spinosa) is a truly amazing species!
